text: Ajarchu Pathian kajetmak miring lekkhat in jetlei theileiya eini karra inheiluutjei, inmani'n eini Pathian riangwai chongpui kha aleiitiang inchoiya akadikmak chuontho nasik-ah lam inminchang jei, halli inkhatbit ka-eii eini Karu khat-um Pumi Jisu Christa kha inmani'n zootmu. Inmani'n mangna inmunasik eii tikha Pathianchong khan apha matiang aleirilsuokjei.
